about_the_game: Tired of the bothersome "UNLICENSED COPY OF U98X" in the bottom right corner? Now's your chance to make the world a better place by purchasing an official license of the world's favorite OS, U98X! Sure, we *might* have a monopoly on Backrooms operating systems, but what are you gonna do? Cry about it? Also grants access to fancy wallpapers.
detailed_description: Tired of the bothersome "UNLICENSED COPY OF U98X" in the bottom right corner? Now's your chance to make the world a better place by purchasing an official license of the world's favorite OS, U98X! Sure, we *might* have a monopoly on Backrooms operating systems, but what are you gonna do? Cry about it? Also grants access to fancy wallpapers.
legal_notice: Created by James Madsen Digital Enterprises 2022
name: PURCHASE U98X GENUINE LICENSE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 Ti or AMD Equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or R9 390

short_description: Purchase an official U98X Operating System license, and use the in-game menus guilt-free knowing you're not committing piracy. Also grants access to fancy wallpapers!
